mainMenu: You have added <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as> word%s to your spelling list.
onBoarding: To get started you will first need to add words to your spelling list. To do this, say, add word.
onBoardingReprompt: Say, add word, to get started.
youCanSay: You can say, start spelling test <break time="0.5s"/>, add word <break time="0.5s"/>, delete word <break time="0.5s"/>, read spelling list <break time="0.5s"/>, or delete spelling list <break time="0.5s"/>. What would you like to do?
goodBye: Ok, Princess Zara, let's practice again soon. Good bye.
cancelExit: Or say, cancel, to exit Zara's Spelling Bee.
cancelToMenu: Or say, cancel, to return to the main menu.
cantDoThis: Sorry, I can't do this yet. Maybe you can ask Daddy to teach me?
helpOnBoarding: Zara's Spelling Bee is all about helping you practice your spellings. The first thing you need to do is add a word to your spelling list. Once you have done this you will be able to add more words, delete words, and take a spelling test. To get started you say, add word, or cancel to exit spell master. What would you like to do?
helpNav: You can say, start spelling test <break time="0.5s"/>, add word <break time="0.5s"/>, delete word <break time="0.5s"/>, read spelling list <break time="0.5s"/>, delete spelling list <break time="0.5s"/>, or cancel to exit spell master. What would you like to do?
helpReadList: You can say, repeat, to hear the words again.
helpSpellTest: You can ask me to repeat a word, spell a word, and restart the spelling test.
addWord: Please spell the word you would like to add.
confirmAddWord: Do you want me to add the word, %s?
confirmAddWordReprompt: Say yes to add the word, or no to exclude it.
confirmAddWordHelp: Say yes to add the word, %s, or no to exclude it.
wordAdded: %s, has been added. Please spell another word you would like to add.
duplicateEntry: %s, is already in your spelling list.
deleteWord: Please spell the word you would like to delete.
confirmDeleteWord: Do you want me to delete the word, %s?
confirmDeleteWordReprompt: Say yes to delete the word, or no to keep it.
confirmDeleteWordHelp: Say yes to delete the word, %s, or no to keep it.
cannotDeleteWord: I can't delete %s, it is not in your spelling list.
wordDeleted: %s, has been deleted. Please spell another word you would like to delete.
confirmDeleteList: Do you want me to delete your spelling list?
confirmDeleteListReprompt: Say yes to delete, or no to keep it.
listDeleted: Your spelling list has been deleted.
readWords: You have added <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as> word%s to your spelling list. They are, <break time="0.5s"/> %s. Would you like me to read that again?
readWordsReprompt: Would you like me to read that again?, Say yes to read again, or no to cancel.
startingSpellingTest: At any time you can ask me to repeat a word or have me spell it for you. Starting spelling test.
resumeSpellingTest: At any time you can restart your spelling test by saying, restart. Resuming spelling test. You are on the <say-as interpret-as="ordinal">%d</say-as> word.
confirmSpeltWordReprompt: Say yes to confirm, or no to spell it again.
spellingWordAddToList: %s is spelt, %s. Do you want me to add it?
spellingWordDeleteToList: %s is spelt, %s. Do you want me to add it?
correct: That is correct. Well done Zara!
incorrect: Ahhhhhh... That is incorrect. %s is spelt %s.
testSummary: Woo hoo! We've come to the end of our spelling bee for this week. You scored <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as> out of <say-as interpret-as="cardinal">%d</say-as>. Well done for practicing.
